name: browser-secure
description: Secure browser automation with vault integration, approval gates, and audit logging

scripts.install:full: npm install && npm run build && npm link

optionalEnv.BW_CLIENTID: Bitwarden API key ID (for automation - stored in .env only on trusted machines)
optionalEnv.BW_CLIENTSECRET: Bitwarden API key secret (for automation - stored in .env only on trusted machines)
optionalEnv.BW_PASSWORD: Bitwarden master password (alternative to session token)
